app.name: Techeaz Support
app.description: Get help and find answers to frequently asked questions

faqs.question: How do I get started with Techeaz?
faqs.answer: Welcome to Techeaz! To get started, simply create an account on our website, verify your email address, and follow our quick setup guide. You'll be up and running in minutes!

faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: To reset your password, go to the login page and click 'Forgot Password'. Enter your email address and we'll send you a secure link to create a new password. The link expires after 1 hour for security.

faqs.question: How do I update my billing information?
faqs.answer: You can update your billing information by logging into your account and navigating to Settings > Billing. From there, you can update your payment method, billing address, and view your invoice history.

faqs.question: Why is my connection slow?
faqs.answer: Slow connections can be caused by several factors: network congestion, server load, or local internet issues. Try refreshing the page, checking your internet connection, or clearing your browser cache. If the problem persists, contact our technical support team.

faqs.question: What browsers are supported?
faqs.answer: Techeaz works best on modern browsers including Chrome (version 90+), Firefox (version 88+), Safari (version 14+), and Edge (version 90+). We recommend keeping your browser updated for the best experience.

faqs.question: Is my data secure?
faqs.answer: Yes! We take security seriously. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest using industry-standard encryption. We're SOC 2 Type II compliant and regularly undergo security audits. Your data is never shared with third parties without your explicit consent.

faqs.question: How do I export my data?
faqs.answer: You can export your data anytime from your account dashboard. Go to Settings > Data Export, select the data you want to export, and choose your preferred format (CSV, JSON, or PDF). Large exports may take a few minutes to process.

faqs.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
faqs.answer: We're sorry to see you go! You can cancel your subscription at any time from Settings > Billing > Manage Subscription. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period, and you can reactivate anytime.

announcements.title: System Maintenance Scheduled
announcements.message: We'll be performing routine maintenance on Sunday, January 21st from 2:00 AM - 4:00 AM EST. During this time, some services may be temporarily unavailable.

quick_actions.title: Contact Support
quick_actions.description: Get in touch with our support team
